title.value: Veterinary and sanitary parameters of pork when using averpharm, pharmacin and absinthium tincture for treatment of young pigs infected with strongyloidosis
Ветеринарно-санитарные показатели свинины при использовании аверфарма, фармацина и настоя полыни горькой для лечения молодняка свиней, больного стронгилоидозом

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Bondar, T.V., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: As a result of veterinary and sanitary studies it has been established that administration of absinthium tincture for strongyloidosis in pigs doesn't have a negative effect on organoleptic indicators and physiochemical parameters of their meat. When plant anthelmintic is used by indicators of relative biological value and toxicity pork is characterized as more wholesome food in comparison with the meat from pigs treated with Averpharm and Pharmacin. Meat from animal of all groups does not contain germs of food toxicoinfections and toxicoses, which characterizes it as safe foodstuff
